title: Effect of the COVID-19 Pandemic on Outcomes for Patients Admitted with Gastrointestinal Bleeding in New York City.
text: Effect of the COVID-19 Pandemic on Outcomes for Patients Admitted with Gastrointestinal Bleeding in New York City.

similar.title: Crisis in New York City.
text: The coronavirus outbreak has hit the city hard and doctors are racing to treat the rapidly increasing cases, reports Carrie Arnold.
